text: Oskar Leimgruber (5 July 1886 â€“ 19 July 1976) was a Swiss politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic People's Party (CVP). He was the 9th Chancellor of Switzerland from 1944 to 1951. == Other websites == * * Category:1886 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Federal Chancellors of Switzerland Category:People from Fribourg
title: Oskar Leimgruber
